resources.string: What are the disadvantages or problems?
Do you really want to delete?
Specify the server address and do not forget to specify the port (last 4 digits)

Generate a detailed business plan by sequentially addressing 5 key questions. Based on the answers, create a structured document with analysis, strategies, and financial calculations. Also, include a financial plan table using markdown.
1. Business name: %1$s 2. Business concept: %2$s (What will the company do? Briefly describe the product or service.) 3. Target audience: %3$s (Who are the main customers? Their age, income, and needs.) 4. Competitive advantages: %4$s (Why will customers choose this business? Unique features.) 5. Monetization model: %5$s (How will the business earn money? Main revenue sources, pricing.) 6. Barriers and solutions: %6$s (What are the main risks? How to minimize them?)
Additional sections (generate them based on the answers above): - Market analysis (niche, trends, competitors) - Marketing and promotion (channels, budget) - Operations (location, equipment, logistics) - Financial plan (investments, expenses, payback) - KPIs (key performance indicators)
Please select the file with the .task extension.
The model has been uploaded successfully!
